title: Lissandra Q indicator.
body: Okay, so I play a lot of Sion. And I really like Sion's E. I think it's very clear as to where your shot will end up landing. Lissandra, as far as I'm aware, (having tested and checked the lolwiki) functions the same way. No matter where it hits, it will extend to the full length + 100 units. For quality of life purposes, I was wondering if Riot could look into changing the Q indicator.

+1

At least make it so that the indicator on where Lissandra is gonna land, is only visible if _you actually have vision on Lissandra_. The projectile-speed of E is pretty low anyway, so you have time to react, even if there's no indicator. Since the nerfs to Q, the ice witch needs a lil' love.

Well, I guess it also makes sense that Lissandra can choose to reactivate it or not, which leaves her a bit safe, as opposed to champions who have to commit to their ability, such as Gnar.

But yeah, considering that you don't reactivate the ability either to juke an enemy or waste the other team's cooldowns by making them anticipate it (which is pointless since E's cooldown is so high that once you're ready to use it again to engage their cooldowns will all be  up again...), it could use at least the element of surprise to its advantage.

I believe one of the main reasons behind this is because it causes problems when coming out of fog of war. Take bot lane, she can use her e to go from the river brush into the lane for an easy roam. For similar reasons they changed it so that her e marker also shows up within terrain so that Lissandra's don't blink up from nowhere.
